text: El buscabullas (Brawlers) is a 1976 Mexican western drama movie directed by Raúl de Anda, Jr. and starring Rodolfo de Anda, Héctor Suárez, Silvia Manríquez, Jorge Russek. It was distributed by Cine Visión. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Mexican Western (genre) movies
title: El buscabullas
